citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 am on June
10, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the residence and kennel and
honking the vehicle horn. Not finding anyone, a call was made to the licensee and a message left. The inspector waited
30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 am on June 
10, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the residence and kennel and 
honking the vehicle horn. Not finding anyone, a call was made to the licensee and a message left. The inspector waited 
30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
